content: this legal text summarizes a notary document from february 17 2004 it outlines the details of two properties one on the first floor and one on the ground floor including their rooms and cadastral income the document assigns ownership and usufruct rights to different individuals for each property the total value of the properties is divided into two equal shares the document also mentions the common courtyard and the responsibilities of the coowners the parties involved in the agreement agree on the distribution of shares and waive the need for witnesses the document confirms the legal status of the properties and the rights of the coowners the coowners agree to equally bear the expenses and guarantee the availability of the properties finally the document is signed by all parties involved
